column2: evamas, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I started to use Pamprin, and it works wonders! I get blotted and pain on my breast and this medication had has reduced those two things. I highly recommend it.

column2: Mom of handicapped daughter, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My adult daughter has Rett Syndrome and cannot talk.  After we gave her the multi symptom pamprin, she started staring blankly and drooling and became very pale.  Then in the night she feel head first out of her bed, which she never has done and turned blue.  This drug effected her in a dangerous way.  It it was not good to give to her before she went to sleep as well.

I took 2 pills per the directions. My main reason for taking this was for bloating. However, now my head feels fuzzy and I cannot think normally. I took the pills 7 hours ago and I still am not thinking clearly. However, the bloating is gone, so I guess I will take these at bedtime from now on.

column2: ashley61225@yahoo.com, 13-18 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I tried this medication yesturday and i have not slept since. It says on the bottle it may cause excitability, and thats true! Im 14 and was dying from the pain. Most of my friends take pamprin so i decided to try it cause of the unusual bloating and overall pain. I only took one dosage, (2 pills)over 12 hours ago, and im still OFF THE WALL. Its like i have no control of myself. Lol. I just have to be careful when i take this med, but overall im still very pleased, great product. Very Recommended.

column9: I have taken this product over and over again, when it comes to mestrual pains and moodiness, this product for me, it does not work. It actually makes me moodier, my body feels down, and the pain is still there.

column2: heatherkuy, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: While it did improve my mood, it does make me significantly drowsy, and I consistently have had violent nightmares with the medication.  It had been a couple years since trying it, so I decided to try - and again with the nightmares.  They say it's an uncommon side affect, but apparently there is something in it that my body doesn't like.

column2: annetrice, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Suffered w fibroids, had an embolization, periods much better now, but irritability and bloating is aggravating. this med is great, works great and quickly. best thing over the counter

column2: Anshul, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have heard a lot about this medicine for period pains, but this is the first time i took this.. and to my surprise it was no relief with my menstrual pain, i felt drowsy for 30mins but now i am again feeling the lower abdominal pain which gets worse in sometime, shall i take another dose of it?is it required to take more than one caplet at a time as this is not reducing any pain.Please advice me its usage.

column2: Mom on a mission, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: I'v had menstrual migraines for years and I have never, I mean never had any relief.  I'm usually sick and in bed during my period and completely out of it. I didnt want to continue missing work for a migraine.I tried this medication out of the blue and it workded wonders. This took away my migraine, nausea, bloating and fatigue. This medicine is truly a blessing. The only thing that I didnt like was I had to use the bathroom all day and all night. As far the other symtoms they were completely gone. I had to take the good with the bad. Make sure you take it as scheduled. It says take it every 4-6 hours. I kept in on scedule and could definitely tell if I did not. Start the meds a day or two before your period is scheduled to start and you will feel like a new woman and completly functioning as normal. Good Luck

column9: I like it, it doesn't relieve all the symptoms it says (bloating mainly) but the pain is the main thing I need fixed!  I usually have to take 2-3, 2 makes me sleepy and 3 makes me pass out, straight up.

column2: purenutria, 25-34 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I know Pamprin is something most people use for menstrual cycles but I have found it more effective than Tylenol or any other OTC for sciatica as well as migraines. it also does a good job when I have a toothache due to sensitive teeth. and it's not just for women. my son takes it for his migraines and it's the only thing that has ever worked.

column2: crabbynurse, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: Pamprin really works well for both cramps and irritability.  It does make me a bit sleepy though so it's tricky taking it at work.

column2: myself_refined, 19-24 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I have had painful periods sense i can remember.  My periods weren't all simply pain, I also had extreme irritability.  I was so snappy with everyone my entire period and even for a few days afterward.  About an hour after taking pamprin I, as well as everyone around me, noticed a significant difference in my mood as well as pain level.  Pamprin has worked better than any strong, narcotic pain medication I have ever taken.  Pamprin is truly my wonder drug.
